PageDescription: Work on office files from your WordPress account
Subheader: Work on office files from your WordPress account
FullyCompatibleWithDocxXlsxAndPptx: Volledig geschikt voor docx, xlsx en pptx
DocspaceAppHeader: Embed office documents into your WordPress website
DocspaceAppTab1Label: Create, upload and embed docs, sheets, slides, PDFs or to your website.
DocspaceAppTab2Label: Embed the entire room into your webpage allowing visitors to view documents right in the browser.
DocspaceAppTab3Label: Integrate complex PDF forms for filling them in online. Automatically collect and analyze data.
DocspaceAppTab4Label: Prevent downloading, printing and copying documents from your website.
DocspaceAppScreen2Header: Efficiently manage documents from your WordPress account
DocspaceAppScreen2Tab1Label: Create a secure space for all your docs. Easily access it anytime anywhere
DocspaceAppScreen2Tab2Label: Organiseer uw persoonlijke bestanden en creëer kamers voor uw zakelijke documenten.
DocspaceAppScreen2Tab3Label: Bied flexibele toegangsrechten: bewerken, opmerkingen plaatsen, beoordelen of alleen bekijken.
DocspaceAppScreen2Tab4Label: Edit and collaborate on documents with other WordPress users online.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Built to work in WordPress seamlessly
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Install ONLYOFFICE DocSpace app for WordPress from the WordPress Plugin Directory.
DocsAppHeader: Add office documents to your WordPress pages
DocsAppTab1Label: Add ONLYOFFICE blocks to posts to insert documents in the embedded mode.
DocsAppTab2Label: Edit docs, sheets, slides uploaded to WordPress via admin dashboard.
DocsAppTab3Label: Collaborate on office files in real time with other WordPress admins.
Reason1: Een uitgebreide reeks tools voor bewerken, opmaken en stylen. <0>Geïntegreerde AI helper</0> (ChatGPT of ZhiPu Copilot).
Reason2: <0>Realtime</0> en paragraafvergrendeling, gezamenlijke bewerking, beoordeling, versiegeschiedenis, documentvergelijking, opmerkingen en vermeldingen.
Reason3: <0>Built-in chat</0> and Telegram integration. Jitsi and Rainbow plugins for real-time communication.
Reason4: Ondersteuning voor meer dan <0>50 bestandsformaten</0>. Volledig geschikt voor MS Office-formaten: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason5: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Activity tracking and audit reporting. Encryption at rest and in transit. Open source code.
Reason6: <0>Free plan to start</0>. Business plan for more admins, bigger storage, enhanced security and professional support. Self-hosted solution for total control over your data.
HowToStartStep1Docs: Implementeer <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> op uw eigen server of meld u aan voor <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2Docs: Get the integration app from <0>GitHub</0> or <1>WordPress Plugin Directory</1>.
HowToStartStep2Docspace: Get the integration app from <0>WordPress Plugin Directory</0>.
HowToStartStep3: Upload and configure the integration app.
ReadDetailedInstructionsDocSpace: Lees de gedetailleerde instructies in het <0>Helpcentrum</0>.
ReadDetailedInstructionsDocs: Read detailed instructions on <0>GitHub</0> and in the <1>Help Center</1>.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Heeft u een app nodig om ONLYOFFICE Docs te koppelen aan uw favoriete webservice? Of heeft u er een ontwikkeld?
